# Start here

This is a short course on linear models using the R programming language.

Each day will comprise a 1 hour lecture in the morning, and a practical lab in the afternoon.

Before starting, please make sure you have a working installation of R and RStudio. You can find detailed instructions at [this link](https://uoepsy.github.io/scs/dpuk/install-update-r.html).
